segments.text: Excuse me , Professor . I have to talk to you about why my homework didn't get done .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What happened that you didn't get it done ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I had to watch a football game instead .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , you had more than one day ; couldn't you have fit it in on another day ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Either way , I only allow one missed assignment per semester . When will you be turning the make-up in ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'll make it up next week .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Fine , but it cannot happen again if you want an “ A ” in the class .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Remember that you are in college now , not high school .
segments.speaker: S2
